Text: NYMEX Closing PricesPlease find attached a strip for October October NYMEX settlement prices Kay
NYMEX Closing PricesPlease find attached a strip for October October NYMEX settlement prices Kay
Prices for Stan Presentation Cc Michelle Here is a spreadsheet containing the various prices you requested this morning for the period June to present Kay
NYMEX Closing PricesPlease find attached a strip for October October NYMEX settlement prices Kay

RE Information Request for LS Power FDD Overrun Analysis Cc Kent and Tim Here are the gas daily prices at demarc that you requested Mike is working on incorporating the daily allocation data in each sum sheet for June forward and he will provide you that information as soon as possible Please let me know if you need further details from me Thanks Kay Original Message From Threet Kay Sent Thursday October AM To Bodnar Michael Cc Blair Lynn Neville Sue Miller Kent Johanson Tim Subject Information Request for LS Power FDD Overrun Analysis Mike Kent and Tim called me this morning and said that they have received a letter from LS Power requesting compensation for costs they feel they incurred to adjust their supply due to cuts on their FDD overrun Their analysis applies to the period June to present Kent and Tim need data to perform an analysis that will be used to respond to LS Powers USES request Kent has requested the following for the period June forward A list of days where at least one cycle was not allocated in other words if we allocated one or more cycles of a gas day but not every cycle regardless of which cycle was not allocated they need an electronic list of those days Electronic copies of each of your final month end sum sheets for June forward They want to answer the customer within a week so theyll need this information at least by early next week Kent has requested that all of the information be sent to both him and Tim Thanks for your help Kay

Information Request for LS Power FDD Overrun Analysis Cc Mike Kent and Tim called me this morning and said that they have received a letter from LS Power requesting compensation for costs they feel they incurred to adjust their supply due to cuts on their FDD overrun Their analysis applies to the period June to present Kent and Tim need data to perform an analysis that will be used to respond to LS Powers USES request Kent has requested the following for the period June forward A list of days where at least one cycle was not allocated in other words if we allocated one or more cycles of a gas day but not every cycle regardless of which cycle was not allocated they need an electronic list of those days Electronic copies of each of your final month end sum sheets for June forward They want to answer the customer within a week so theyll need this information at least by early next week Kent has requested that all of the information be sent to both him and Tim Thanks for your help Kay

MidAmerican Gas Purchase Payment Cc Frank This email will confirm that MidAmerican will not be paid for the November gas purchase amount of since they have already shortpaid their transportation invoice by this amount I spoke with Mark Walton in Finance this afternoon and he said that they are aware of the situation and have already taken the appropriate actions to cancel the wire transfer that would have gone out to MidAmerican later this month Also FYI I did check with the Contracts Group about payment terms in GISB agreements Section of the GISB form stipulates the payment date as being the th day of the month following the month of delivery I spoke with Renee Perry in Gas Logistics this afternoon and she is looking into compiling an invoice for finance charges on the balance shortpaid for the period November th November th Please call me if you need further information Thanks Kay
